Posts.Content: I'm glad you decided to go ahead with the oncotype test. I can't help you with the other problem. I know a month is a long time to wait for news...but I'll keep you in my prayers. Keep a positive attitued. Teresa
Posts.Title: oncotype

Posts.Content: Good question, If I'm terminal and not feeling well enough to do anything but set around and be in pain,,,,,take me now. But if I can still visit with friends and have time to say good by without being high on drugs then I would rather do that. How do you have your ashes made into a diamond???? I would love info on that. Thanks Teresa
Posts.Title: Morbid, thought provoking moment...
